main event: An unidentified flying object was observed at Lake Charles AFB, LA, on October 6, 1952, hovering and performing maneuvers.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime at arm's length, hovered briefly, and made right angle turns., The observation lasted for about 5 minutes., Heavy air traffic was noted in the area during the sighting., The object was seen almost overhead before dimming out due to an intervening balloon release., There was no sound associated with the object due to the aircraft noise in the area.
